plot: The day Anastasia Kamenskaya gets married, two brides are murdered during the wedding ceremonies. A freelance photographer volunteers to help her in solving these crimes.
title: Kamenskaya: Smert i nemnogo lyubvi
plot_es: The day Anastasia Kamenskaya gets married, two brides are murdered during the wedding ceremonies. A freelance photographer volunteers to help her in solving these crimes.
plot_en: The day Anastasia Kamenskaya gets married, two brides are murdered during the wedding ceremonies. A freelance photographer volunteers to help her in solving these crimes.
